message.content:
Initialize Alert Fields and Mitre ATT&CK IDs

- {{vars.attack_ids}}

resource.name: Suspicious Email:{{vars.source_data.headers.subject}}
resource.description:
Alert Description:

{%if 'Fw:' in vars.source_data.headers.subject or 'Fwd:' in vars.source_data.headers.subject %} Email: ||**{{vars.source_data.headers.subject}}**|| Submited by **{{vars.source_data.headers.from}}** {%endif%}

MITRE ATT&CK Summary:

Related MITRE ATT&CK Technique Description:

{{vars.mitre_attack_technique_data.detection}}

Related MITRE ATT&CK Technique Mitigation:

{{vars.mitre_attack_technique_data.mitigations}}

params.body:
Your email with Subject: << {{vars.source_data.headers.subject}} >> has been received,
you shall receive the investigation results as soon as available.

SoC Team
params.subject: Suspicious Email received for investigation

message.content:
Auto-response Notification to Sender

- Email Reporter has been notified, Suspicious content under investigation

steps.name: Send Verdict Notification to All Recipients

params.body:
The reported Phishing email with:
- Subject: << {{vars.source_data.headers.subject}} >> 
- Sent by :  {{vars.email_from}}
Is deemed <<Malicious>>, Sender will be been blocked on the secure email gateway and the received email will be **moved to Trash**.



SoC Team
params.subject: SOC Notification: Suspicious Email from << {{vars.email_from}} >> Verdict

message.content:
Sender Auto-response Notification to Recipients

The reported Phishing email with: - Subject: << {{vars.source_data.headers.subject}} >> - Sent by : [ {{vars.email_from}} ] > Is deemed Malicious, Sender will be been blocked on the secure email gateway and the received email will be **moved to Trash**.

Block Email Sender on FortiMail

> At least one Indicator reputation was found to be [ Malicious ].

The email sender: [ {{vars.email_from}} ] has been blocked on the FortiMail.

Create SOC Analyst investigation Task

- A new task has been created for EIS: Review the related alerts from [ {{vars.email_from}} ].

resource.name: Review Blocked Emails
resource.taskdata:
Emails: {{vars.email_from}} has been blocked on FortiGate,
review the action and unblock it if required:
1. Open any Alert
2. Click Action
3. Select FortiMail
4. Select Unblock Email action
5. set the email to: {{vars.email_from}}
6. Click Execute
resource.description:
The email sender [ {{vars.email_from}} ] has been blocked on the FortiMail, review the action and unblock it if required.

The steps to unblock the email sender are:
1. Open related Alerts
2. Click Action
3. Select FortiMail
4. Select Unblock Email action
5. Set the email to: [ {{vars.email_from}} ]
6. Click Execute

steps.name: Original Email Attached
steps.description: Check Whether the email is forwarded inline or as an attachment

message.content:
Create Email Record

- Email was submitted via forwarding inline

Create Email Record

- Email was submitted via forwarding as an attachment

params.python_function:
import base64
file="{{vars.file_attachements.0.file}}"
filename="{{vars.file_attachements.0.metadata.filename}}"
try:
	with open('/tmp/'+filename, 'wb') as tmp_file:
		tmp_file.write(base64.b64decode(file))
except:
	print('Generic: Could not write attachment!')

message.content:
Storing Attachments File

- The file attachments are saved to the local disk for further processing.

Uploading Attachment Indicator

- File attachment have been uploaded into FortiSOAR and attachments has been created

arguments.operationTitle: File: Upload a file to CyOPs and Create an Attachment

message.content:
Creating IP Indicator

IP indicators are being created for each IP indicator found in the email.

Find IP Indicators

Host indicators from the reported email are being processed.

Find Host Indicators

Host indicators from the reported email are being processed.

Find URL Indicators

Host indicators from the reported email are being processed.

Find Email Indicators

Email indicators from the reported email are being processed.

Link IP Indicators to Alert

All of the created IP indicators have been linked to this alert.

Creating URL Indicator

URL indicators are being created for each URL indicator found in the email.

Link URL Indicators to Alert

All of the created URL indicators have been linked to this alert.

Link Host Indicators to Alert

All of the created host indicators have been linked to this alert.

Creating Host Indicator

Host indicators are being created for each host indicator found in the email.

Link Email Indicators to Alert

All of the created email indicators have been linked to this alert.

Creating Email Indicator

Email indicators are being created for each email indicator found in the email.

Automatic Alert Closure

No malicious indicators were found in the reported email. Due to this the alert was closed [ Automatically ] and no further action is required.

resource.ackSlaStatus: {% if globalVars.Current_Date <= vars.steps.Update_Alert.dueBy %}{{"SLAState" | picklist("Met", "@id")}}{% else %}{{"SLAState" | picklist("Missed", "@id")}}{% endif %}
resource.closureNotes: No malicious indicators were found in the email. Due to this the alert was [ Automatically ] closed.
resource.respSlaStatus: {% if globalVars.Current_Date <= vars.steps.Update_Alert.respDueDate %}{{"SLAState" | picklist("Met", "@id")}}{% else %}{{"SLAState" | picklist("Missed", "@id")}}{% endif %}

message.content:
Creating User and perform AD Enrichment

- {{vars.item.split('@')[0]}}

Delete Phishing Emails from Inbox

- Inbox: {{vars.item}}

Incident Response Complete

- Alert Closed

resource.closureNotes:
Alert Closed


Phishing email confirmed, affected users informed and suspect email moved to trash on all inboxes

routes.name: Prepare File Attachments -> Record File Attachment
Upload File IOCs -> Create Indicators
Record File Attachment -> Upload File IOCs
Create Attached Email -> Parse Attached Email Attributes
Parse Attached Email Attributes -> Prepare File Attachments
Create Inline Email -> Parse Inline Email Attributes
Parse Inline Email Attributes -> Prepare File Attachments
Create File Indicators -> Extract Indicators
Extract Indicators -> Copy  of Whitelist local attributes
Original Email Attached -> Create Inline Email
routes.label: no

routes.name: Original Email Attached -> Copy  of Create Inline Email
routes.label: yes

routes.name: Start -> Set Source Data
Whitelist local attributes -> Find IP Indicators
Whitelist local attributes -> Find URL Indicators
Whitelist local attributes -> Find Host Indicators
Whitelist local attributes -> Find Email Indicators
Create IP Indicator -> Link Indicators
Process IP Indicators -> Set IP Lists
Set IP Lists -> Create IP Indicator
Find IP Indicators -> Flatten IP lists
Flatten IP lists -> Process IP Indicators
Find URL Indicators -> Copy  of Flatten IP lists
Find Host Indicators -> Copy  of Copy  of Flatten IP lists
Find Email Indicators -> Copy 1 of Copy  of Flatten IP lists
Flatten URL lists -> Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators
Flatten Host lists -> Copy  of Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators
Flatten Email lists -> Copy 1 of Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators
Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators -> Copy  of Set IP Lists
Copy  of Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators -> Copy  of Copy  of Set IP Lists
Copy 1 of Copy 1 of Process IP Indicators -> Copy 1 of Copy  of Set IP Lists
Set URL Lists -> Wait for URLs
Set Host Lists -> Wait for Hosts
Set Email Lists -> Wait for Emails
Wait for URLs -> Create URL Indicator
Create URL Indicator -> Link URL Indicators
Wait for Hosts -> Copy  of Copy  of Create IP Indicator
Copy  of Copy  of Create IP Indicator -> Copy  of Copy  of Link Indicators
Wait for Emails -> Copy 1 of Create IP Indicator
Copy 1 of Create IP Indicator -> Copy 1 of Link Indicators
Indicators Malicious -> Block Email Sender
routes.label: yes

routes.name: Link Host Indicators -> Wait for indicators Reputation
Link Email Indicators -> Wait for indicators Reputation
Link URL Indicators -> Wait for indicators Reputation
Link IP Indicators -> Wait for indicators Reputation
Wait for indicators Reputation -> Get Indicators
Get Indicators -> Get Indicators Reputation
Get Indicators Reputation -> Indicators Malicious
Indicators Malicious -> False positive Alert
routes.label: no

routes.name: Create File Indicators -> Create Users
Block Email Sender -> Send Sender Bock Notification to All Recipients
Review Blocked Emails -> Delete Phishing Emails
Delete Phishing Emails -> Close Alert as True Positive
Create File Indicators -> initialize Env
Extract Indicators -> Wait for a bit
Wait for a bit -> Send Auto_Reply to Sender
Send Sender Bock Notification to All Recipients -> Review Blocked Emails
Find Related MITRE Attack ID -> Get MITRE Attack Technique Data
Get MITRE Attack Technique Data -> Update Alert
Update Alert -> Original Email Attached
Local Attributes -> Find Related MITRE Attack ID
Extract Indicators -> Create Attachment
Create Attachment -> Submit Attachment
